website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for the goth set, or for adding a bit of flair to the bar.
pros: The eye-catching cobra head with ruby glass eyes is still ergonomic when in use, plus the twist has perfect gauging for spinning
cons: It’s a more expensive price point

customer_reviews.title: Perfect schlock for your totally serious home bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this spoon. The shaft is consistent and smooth, the spoon has a good shape, and the cobra detail is just as cheesy as it looks. The eyes are really epoxied in there, and are still attached after many vigorous dishwashings. The glittering rhinestones and chromed hood are even gaudier in real life than they appear in the pic. Only issue is that the spoon is pretty small, about 3/4" across, and holds maybe half a teaspoon. It's fine for stirring but poor for swizzling. Remember to adjust recipes that call for barspoons, because this one holds less!
customer_reviews.author: MagiKazoc

customer_reviews.title: It will give you powers
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to arrive. But. Used for a solid year+ and washed it 100,000x and beat it up for bar service and the rubies are still in the eyes. Everyone loves it. Makes me feel like Jafar.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. North

customer_reviews.title: after our favorite movie vampyre
customer_reviews.text: Cute and effective. We named ours "Petyr", after our favorite movie vampyre. Seems to be made of durable stainless steel, but not sure about this. Could be plated, but seems solid for now.
customer_reviews.author: Face_The_Facts

customer_reviews.title: Sssneaky Kung Fu Cool Retro Cobra Cocktail Spoon
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and we'll made retro kung fu cobra kitschy coolness... Head is solid, and weight is good for a smaller cocktail stirrer. I'd love to see this in an antique brass, copper, or gun metal finish, with clear or green glass eye options; even a longer version would be well worth a few extra dollars. Cheers! Keep up the good work. Here's hoping to see your lineup continue to grow!
customer_reviews.author: christopher ycaza

customer_reviews.title: Great bar spoon
customer_reviews.text: Great bar spoon. I was concerned it would just be a cheap product, but it has a nice weight to it, and spins nicely between my fingers. Something fun for me, and for the guests that visit my bar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Gets compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's always nice to have a unique piece to stand out. This bar spoon is well built and always catches an eye.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Badass bar spoon.
customer_reviews.text: Been serving me well for months. I'm wary of the Cthulhu head's plating surviving repeat trips through the dish washer, so I've only ever hand washed this spoon. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: Fun novelty bar spoon, but the crucifix is not attached to the spoon itself securely.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product! It is stunning and unique and also ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! It is stunning and unique and also made of durable material. I have used this to stir simple cocktails at home as well as drinks in a pitcher at brunch or BBQ's. Even when I am not using the spoon I keep it on display in my kitchen as it draws attention with its jewel details. Great quality!!! I would recommend to a friend and look forward to more luxe products from Mixologist Technologist!
customer_reviews.author: Sherbune Paul

customer_reviews.title: Add a dash more panache
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is stone cold cool. Build quality is great - it does everything it should, and feels good in the hand. But, the true value of the piece is beyond this - a baton for conducting good times, strong drinks, and all-true tall tales of high adventure. Damn if it hasn't become one of my favourite (and most-commented-on) home bar tools.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely fantastic. I've had a long handled bar spoon, but this adds just the right touch to my bar. The quality and detail are both superb, and I don't doubt that I will use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L

customer_reviews.title: Super excited to test this out.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but will update after this busy work weekend. So far the welding of the cthulhu to the stirrer is very well done. The balance and weight is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent bar spoon
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bar spoon. Luckily I've used cheap, poorly designed spoons before and, while I'm not a professional mixologist by any means, I could tell the difference with this one. It allows for easy, smooth stirring, is long enough for most stirring containers, and the cobra head is pretty sweet. I am planning to buy some more as gifts for friends who are building their bar. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Durability, this will last
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than expected. I figured the head would be loosely attached and this would make great display for my bar. Turns out this is my favorite and best cocktail spoon. Has been used vigorously every day for past year, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: One spoon to rule them all !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bar sooon. Design is sick. Comfortable to hold too the head rests perfectly between your thumb and finger. Your old fashions have never tasted this mythological before!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts on this order, but was pleasantly surprised. The details are there and it is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Functional beauty
customer_reviews.text: This spoon is deceiving. It appears as if it would never work well to scoop olives out of their jar, but it most certainly does. A bonus ... it makes me feel elegantly wicked using it!
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for advanced mixing tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality build with good weight distribution between the ends, which makes mixing easy and flawless. The spoon is Extra Long, so it handles amazingly. Eye catching design. Perfect addition for advanced mixing tools.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the barpsoon
customer_reviews.text: Great barspoon, just as pictured, perfect for my metalhead bartender friend. Also writing this review in hopes that the seller wont spam me anymore about writing them a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, not the highest quality though
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a bar spoon should. Is super unique and cool. Where the bowl connects to the stem of the spoon is kind of flimsy, the decorative piece doesnt quite match the color of the rest of and it screws off.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good craftsmanship and quality. Looks even better than I thought it would. Nice weight and traditional bar spoon size. Looking forward to making tons of cocktails at the hands of this dreaded sea monster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I received my cobra bar spoon on time and I'm loving my new bar tool so much I have to purchase another. Can't wait to see what other ideas this company has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.B

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar spoon!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the craftsmanship, the weight, and the fact that the topper doesn't limit my stirring abilities at all. A great product all around!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Sterling

customer_reviews.title: I love the detail on the cobra head
customer_reviews.text: Really well-made addition to my cocktail gear. I love the detail on the cobra head. Despite the obvious ornamentation, it is still very ergonomic in use. I love the flair it adds to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Trev

customer_reviews.title: Great and modular. Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: Great until my barback put it through the dishwasher and I lost Jesus.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Adds some pizzazz to the cocktail making ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Adds some pizzazz to the cocktail making process. Would definitely order other products from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bar spoon and cool look for behind the stick
customer_reviews.author: Christian Marriner

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cocktail spoon! It is so unique I love the cobra head which is the perfect size. I cannot wait to throw a cocktail party and have everyone ask me about this amazing spoon. It is very lightweight and easy to use! Thank you so so much!
customer_reviews.author: Adri Berardi

customer_reviews.title: Add it to the collection
customer_reviews.text: Badass spoon. A bit shorter than the 40cm length I’m used to but works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Decker Beasley

customer_reviews.title: An awesome spoon for mixing cocktails
customer_reviews.text: An awesome spoon for mixing cocktails. Very sturdy, stylish and unique. My friends were thoroughly impressed. Easy to wash, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gelena Alexandrovskaya

customer_reviews.title: Super cool quality bar spoon
customer_reviews.text: If you make cocktails, you need this bar spoon. Comfortable grip for easy maneuvering. Cool design makes it fun for cocktail parties and a must if you own a bar! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Feinstein Lab

customer_reviews.title: The product is easy to use and ideal for making stirred cocktails
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use and ideal for making stirred cocktails. The coils and weight of the spoon have minimized the air in my drinks. My manhattans have never been smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bonne-Annee

customer_reviews.title: Gift For Nerdy Hubs
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted, has done well in the dishwasher. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: but when I do it’s for a bad ass cobra bar spoon
customer_reviews.text: I don’t submit ratings often, but when I do it’s for a bad ass cobra bar spoon!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This barspoon is incredible, and does the job well. It’s very nicely crafted, and I can’t stop getting compliments on how cool it is!
customer_reviews.author: Chico Guzman-Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Not only a very cool item it will be a great conversational piece too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fine addition to any home bar
customer_reviews.text: Good length, well-balanced, smooth in the hand. Well-crafted bar spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Lovecraft's cocktail wand.
customer_reviews.text: Most unique spoon I have. Gets great reactions when making drinks.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Warped spoon
customer_reviews.text: The actual spoon part arrived warped and actually forms a sharp edge. The design overall is nice and the snake looks great but this is very disappointing. Im a full time bartender and I use all my own tools at work.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an Xmas gift for my brother, a cocktail enthusiast and irreverent smart ass. It was perfect! It turns all of your cocktails into wine, though. Happy, sad? P.S. The seller was absolutely great. There was a shipping issue at first, but after contacting her through the Amazon messaging, she took care of everything. No hassles at all. Great customer service! I recommend buying from her!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very sturdy bar spoon. I was afraid since it's a novelty item that it would be made out of tinny material, but it's not. It works perfectly. I liked it enough that I have since purchased one as a gift for a friend who is also a fan of Lovecraftian horror.
customer_reviews.author: Gene P. Breshears

customer_reviews.title: Cool cocktail spoon
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking cocktail spoon; not like your ordinary boring ones. It is a nice weight and the cobra head adds a neat element. Glad to add to my cocktail tools. I had an issue with the one I received and the seller immediately sent a new one and included a very nice personal handwritten note.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C DePaul

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bar spoon!
customer_reviews.text: Really an interesting looking and well made product. Much better than a standard, plain one...
customer_reviews.author: pete wilkens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Feels great while using it. Solid nd a good weight probably steel. Balanced at a certain point. Shaken sucks get a spoon. When you shake a drink breaks the ice down faster. I use mine for coffee too. Loop tied to the end is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. A little flimsy but I cant imagine anyone buying this to smash ice with.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Too cool.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spoon! Even the little eye gems stayed intact longer than my skull spoon from cocktail kingdom. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Montana

customer_reviews.title: H.P. Lovecraft walks into a bar and says....
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to an aspiring bartender and Lovecraft fan. Worked out swimmingly. It has a detailed and attractive design, sits well in your hand, and makes stirring any type of cocktail a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: zarathrustra

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoon
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

product_meta.title: Cocktail Shaker Bar Spoon, Glass Pitcher Stirring Spoon, Long Stainless Steel Cobra Mixing Spoon, Dishwasher Safe (Cobra)
feature_bullets: 🥃 Simply, the most awesome cocktail stirrer in the mixology kingdom. Stir the perfect whiskey, gin, vodka, or tequila drink.
🥃 This coiled, weighted, liquor mixer is no mere rod, but a magic tool to complete your bartending kit. Your martini, manhattan, or mojito will never be the same.
🥃 Excellent for "quiet ice", stirred spirits, and coffee cocktails. You will love this cobra spoon! But don’t stare into its ruby eyes – you might get drunk.
🥃 This barware accessory makes the perfect gift for your Mixologist Technologist and Bartender friends! They are sure to reward you with the perfect drink. 🧐

🥃 All our spoons, shakers, and mats are the highest quality and have a lifetime guarantee. Add our Cobra, Cthulhu, and Christ Stirrers, Scarab Boston Shaker, and Gold, Silver, Copper, and White Bar Mats to your collection!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
